scripts.start: brew services start rabbitmq & NODE_ENV=production node server.js & prometheus --config.file=../Prometheus/prometheus.yml & grafana server --homepath /opt/homebrew/opt/grafana/share/grafana --config=/opt/homebrew/opt/grafana/share/grafana/conf/grafana.ini
scripts.kill: npx kill-port 8000 & npx kill-port 3000 & npx kill-port 9090 & brew services stop rabbitmq & brew services stop grafana
